title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 153 - Signing Of New York State Income Tax Returns, Statements And Other Documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 153 - Signing Of New York State Income Tax Returns, Statements And Other Documents

State Regulations
§ 153.1 - Signing of New York State income tax returns, statements and other documents -general rule
§ 153.2 - Signature by agent
§ 153.3 - Husband and wife signatures
§ 153.4 - Partnerships
§ 153.5 - Certifications
§ 153.6 - Signing of New York State income tax returns and claims for refunds prepared by a person other than the taxpayer

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 153

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 658[g], 697

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
